AAD.caption: JavaScript Code
AAD.doc: The JavaScript code to be executed.
AAD.name: script

AAE.caption: Run Asynchronously
AAE.doc: When enabled, your script will run asynchronously in a non-blocking way. This is required if your code uses await, delay, fetch, or other asynchronous operations. If disabled, the script runs immediately and synchronously.
AAE.name: async

AAF.caption: Debug Mode
AAF.doc: When enabled, the plugin will log the input script, result, and any errors to the browser console. Useful for development and troubleshooting.
AAF.name: debug

AAG.caption: - helpers.log(...args) : Logs one or more values to the browser console, prefixed with [JSAction].
AAG.name: helpers.log

AAH.caption: - helpers.now() : Returns the current date and time as an ISO string.
AAH.name: helpers.now

AAI.caption: - helpers.delay(ms) : Returns a Promise that resolves after the given number of milliseconds (Can be used with await).
AAI.name: helpers.wait
